document_data.caption: A dark naga.
document_data.name: Dark naga
document_data.mainbody: A '''dark naga''' was a variety of [[naga]] that looked like a large purple [[snake]] or eel with a barbed stinger at the end of its tail and a human face. Dark nagas could speak [[Common]] and [[Infernal language|Infernal]]. They liked to plot with other sinister creatures so that they could gather wealth more easily.
document_data.Description:
Dark nagas measured up to approximately {{SI|12|ft|long=yes}} long.. Their scales were dark blue or purple, often with black frills or scale patterns. The body of a dark naga was more similar to that of an eel rather than a snake. Its tail ended in a poisonous stinger.

Their veins contained an oily black or dark brown gore. The ''[[dark naga poison|naga poison]]'', or venom, was a thick black viscous fluid that dripped from the tail singer's venom canal when agitated.
document_data.Society: Dark nagas descended from [[Terpenzi]] were called [[nagara]].
document_data.Combat: Dark nagas would attempt to use high terrain to their advantage to stay out of the reach of their enemies.
document_data.Abilities: They could cast [[sorcerer]] spells and their stings carried a poison that could induce a nightmarish sleep. They were resistant to all charm effects and had the permanent ability to ''[[detect thoughts]]''. Similarly, their own thoughts could not be read.
document_data.Allies: The [[Zhentarim]] were known to use dark nagas as mentors and leaders for bands of [[orc]]s. Dark nagas also worked as divine servants of the [[duergar]] goddess [[Deep Duerra]].{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|11}}
document_data.Notable Dark Nagas:
* [[Calliope (naga)|Calliope]]: the dark naga lover and adviser of [[Pristoleph|Pristoleph the Purple]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
* [[Ebarnaje]]: the King of [[Najara]]
* [[Preybelish]]: a reclusive dark naga amulet collector who resided in the [[Dwarven Dungeons]] under [[Myth Drannor]] ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
* [[Ssasser]], a dark naga of [[Menzoberranzan]] allied with [[House Hunzrin]].
* [[Slithisk]]: a dark naga [[Cyricist]] active ''circa'' the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/61/To Save a Forest|44}}
